import React,{useState,useEffect} from 'react' import './banner.css' import bgImg from '../images/bg-no-hard-feelings.jpeg' function Banner() { const [movies,setMovies] = useState([]); const fetchData = () =>{ fetch('http://localhost:3000/data/movieData.json') .then(res=>res.json()) .then(data => setMovies(data)) .catch(e=>console.log(e.message)); }; useEffect(()=>{ fetchData() },[]) return (
